exercises.name: Hip Circles
exercises.description: Loosen hip joints in all directions
exercises.instructions: Stand on one leg, holding wall for balance if needed. Lift other knee and make large circles with the hip. Go slowly, feel the full range. Switch directions, then legs.

modifications.easier: Hold onto wall, make smaller circles
modifications.harder: No support, larger circles, slower pace

exercises.name: Shoulder Circles
exercises.description: Mobilise shoulder joints and upper back
exercises.instructions: Stand or sit tall. Roll shoulders forward in big circles, then reverse direction. Focus on making full, controlled circles. Keep neck relaxed.

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
exercises.instructions: Sit or stand on one leg. Lift other foot and draw circles with your toes, moving from the ankle. Go both directions. Switch feet.

exercises.name: Neck Rolls
exercises.description: Release neck tension and improve mobility
exercises.instructions: Drop chin to chest. Slowly roll head to one side (ear to shoulder), then back, to other side, and forward again. Move slowly, pause where you feel tightness.

modifications.easier: Half circles only (front), avoid full back extension

exercises.name: Thoracic Spine Rotation
exercises.description: Upper back rotation for posture and mobility
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, place one hand behind head. Rotate that elbow towards opposite arm, then open up towards ceiling. Follow elbow with eyes. Move slowly.

modifications.harder: Hold at end range, add breathing

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.instructions: Lunge forward, place both hands inside front foot. Rotate torso, reaching top arm to ceiling. Return hand to floor. Option to drop rear knee. Switch sides.

modifications.easier: Keep hands on blocks, back knee down
modifications.harder: Add hamstring stretch by straightening front leg

exercises.name: 90/90 Hip Stretch
exercises.instructions: Sit with front leg bent 90 degrees in front, back leg bent 90 degrees to side. Keep spine tall. Lean forward over front shin. Hold, then switch sides.

modifications.easier: Sit on block or cushion, don't lean as far
modifications.harder: Fold chest to floor, longer holds

exercises.name: Wrist Circles
exercises.instructions: Extend arms in front. Make fists and draw circles with your wrists. Go both directions. Then open hands and spread fingers wide, close to fists. Repeat.

modifications.easier: Smaller circles, support forearm with other hand

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.description: Lengthen tight hip flexors from sitting
exercises.instructions: Kneel on one knee, other foot forward. Tuck tailbone under, squeeze rear glute. Shift weight forward until you feel stretch in front of rear hip. Hold and breathe.

modifications.easier: Place padding under knee, don't lunge as deep
modifications.harder: Reach same-side arm overhead, lean away

exercises.name: Calf Stretch
exercises.instructions: Stand facing wall, hands on wall. Step one foot back, keeping heel down and leg straight. Lean into wall until you feel stretch in calf. Hold, then switch.

modifications.easier: Bend back knee slightly for soleus stretch
modifications.harder: Deeper lean, or stretch on step edge
